data.description: File handle with rollbacks and commits
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I created FileHandle::Rollback for Trini, a Pure Perl, One File
    DBMS system I'm writing. Rollback will simplify your job if you use
    a read/write filehandle and would like the ability to cancel your
    changes without having to track them yourself before writing them
    out.
